pullRequest.title: [Broker Load] Ignore empty file when file format is parquet or orc.
pullRequest.bodyText:
Proposed changes
We can not read empty parquet or orc format file. So we should skip them
when doing broker load.
Types of changes

 Bugfix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)

Checklist

 I have create an issue on (Fix #4812), and have described the bug/feature there in detail

commit.message:
[Broker Load] Ignore empty file when file format is parquet or orc.

We can not ready empty parquet or orc format file. So we should skip them
when doing broker load.

nodes.bodyText: filteredFileStatuses.size seems equal fileNum, we could remove fileNum.
